comments.body: FYI after the initial run the crawler's last crawl status will **always** be one of these statuses. Do you think it would make more sense to first check that the crawler is in a "READY" state? I feel like this sensor would be much more useful if it behaved similar to the hook's `wait_for_crawler_completion` and confirmed that the crawler was not currently running.
